featured.text: The task of calculating a carbon footprint.
To introduce a new method of calculating blood alcohol levels.
One of __(34)__ measures is to calculate the percentage of income that people spend on certain necessities.
“Howard calculated the calories of everything he ate during his participation in the program,” his mother said.

As she points out they are not sitting at a table where rich people would sit, her parents calculate the value of the desert hills, the blooming cactus, the calls of eagles, and one another’s company.

definition.zh_def: 計算，通過數學運算得出結果。
definition.en_def: To determine the amount or number of something mathematically.
definition.example: Please calculate the total cost of the items in your cart.
